body_text: Django stores the CSRF token in the user's cookies; we should be pulling it from there instead of redundantly adding it to the HTML for the page. I'm not entirely sure, but this might also help with stale CSRF tokens, as a failed request to the service can return an updated cookie with a fresh token.
